programme.title: Fight Vault - HK47 - Episode 1
programme.sub-title: Fight Vault - HK47 - Episode 1
programme.desc: Hard Knocks 47 kicks off with with a Featherweight Title Fight in the Amateur Division as striker Joe ""Flash"" Mapanda challenges the reigning champion Justin Basra. This is followed by an Amateur Lightweight Title Fight as Tom ""The Greek Warrior"" Theocharis takes on Alex Martinez. Wrapping up this episode is a pro bout between wrestler TJ Laramie and Luke Noel. You do not want to miss it!

programme.title: Ultimate Warrior Challenge - Episode 02
programme.sub-title: Ultimate Warrior Challenge - Episode 02
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage. UFC stars such as Simeon Thoreson, Luke 'Bigslow' Barnatt, RiccoRodriguez,Thierry "The African Assassin" Sokoudjou, Phil De Fries, Paul Kelly to name but a few, have graced the UWC cage. UWC continues to grow and to bring the fight fans across Europe the fights they want to see.

programme.title: Out of the Cage - Owen Carr
programme.sub-title: Out of the Cage - Owen Carr
programme.desc: Owen Carr has been involved in MMA for over 25 years, after being introduced to the sport at a very young age. He has learned persistence and has a strong belief in staying true to himself. He consistantly trains with 30 guys on the mat, and feels he is always well prepared. Today he shares some endurance tips that help him pace himself and stay focused in his matches.
